How can I decode a raw transaction using the Verus command line?

You can decode a raw transaction using the `decoderawtransaction` command, followed by the hex string of the transaction. Here's an example:

```
verus decoderawtransaction "hexstring"
```

i Examples: > verus decoderawtransaction "hexstring" > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "decoderawtransaction", "params": ["hexstring"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
